entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, yelling and trying to tell his story.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister, who is being argued with by Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is trying to explain what happened to Fudge, but he's not listening.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is trying to convince Fudge that Harry and Hermione are confused.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is trying to calm down Harry and get him to leave the room.

entities.name: ron's rat
entities.description: Ron's rat is an Animagus, according to Hermione.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew is the person that Ron's rat is in disguise as.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned as having done a good job on Harry and Hermione, but it's not clear what this means.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore arrives at the end of the scene, and Harry gets up to talk to him.

relationships.description: Harry is arguing with Fudge about what happened.
Hermione is trying to explain what happened to Fudge, but he's not listening.
Snape is trying to convince Fudge that Harry and Hermione are confused.
Madam Pomfrey is trying to calm down Harry and get him to leave the room.
Dumbledore arrives at the end of the scene, and Harry gets up to talk to him.
